* Run jQuery code after document load → `<script>$(document).ready(<code>)</script>`
* Select element by tag → `$("button")`
* Select element by class 'myClass' → `$(".myClass")`
* Select element by id 'myid' → `$("#myid")`
* Add class → `$(target).addClass("<className>")`
* Remove class → `$(target).removeClass("<className>")`
* Adding CSS → `$(target).css("<property>","<value>")`
* Change property of an element → `$(target).prop("<key>", <value>)`
    - Disbale a button → `$("button").prop("disabled", true)`
* Add html tag and text within an element → `$(target).html("<tag>text</tag>")`
* Alter text of an element → `$(target).text("Text")`
* Remove an element from the document → `$(target).remove()`
* Move an element from parent1 to parent2 → `$(target).appendTo(<target of parent2>)`
    - It removes it from parent1
* Copy (clone) an element from parent1 to parent2 → `$(target).clone().appendTo(<target of parent2>)` ← Function chaining
* Access parent of an element → `$(target).parent()`
    - Change background color of parent of a button → `$("button").parent().css("background-color", "red")`
* Access children of an element → `$(target).children()`
* Select n-th child → `$(target:nth-child(n))`
    - Add class 'myClass' to 3rd button having btn class → `$(".btn:nth-child(3)").addClass("myClass")`
    - Note this works for 3rd button having btn class under every parent.
* Odd and even positioned selector → `$(target:odd)`, `$(target:even)`
    - Note the positions are zero-indexed. So :odd selects position second(1), fourth(3), sixth(5) etc
